file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: API documentation
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: http://localhost:5000/
tags:
  - name: User
paths:
  /user/:
    $ref: './resources/user.yaml#/UserPath'
  /user/{id}:
    $ref: './resources/user.yaml#/UserPathWithID'

components:
  schemas:
    User:
      $ref: './schemas/user_schema.yaml'
  securitySchemes:
    BearerAuth:
      $ref: './schemas/security_schema.yaml'
